chairman.name: Dr. Md Asad Shariff
chairman.designation:
President,
Governing Body,
A.E.R.E School and College
chairman.excerpt: The present era is the era of advancement in science and technology. We are committed to providing quality education that prepares students for the challenges of tomorrow.
chairman.message:
Dear Students, Parents, and Well-wishers,

Assalamu Alaikum and warm greetings to all. I welcome you to A.E.R.E School and College, an institution that has been a beacon of academic excellence and moral education since 1992. As the President of this esteemed institution, I am honored to lead a community dedicated to nurturing young minds and shaping future leaders.

Our school was established under the Atomic Energy Research Establishment with a vision to provide comprehensive education that balances academic rigor with character development. Over the past three decades, we have remained committed to this vision, continuously evolving our teaching methodologies and infrastructure to meet the changing needs of modern education while staying rooted in our core values.

At A.E.R.E, we believe that education extends beyond textbooks and examinations. We strive to create an environment where students can discover their passions, develop critical thinking skills, and grow into responsible citizens. Our dedicated faculty members work tirelessly to ensure that each student receives personalized attention and guidance, enabling them to reach their full potential.

We take pride in our state-of-the-art facilities, including well-equipped science laboratories, a comprehensive library, modern computer labs, and excellent sports facilities. These resources, combined with our commitment to holistic education, ensure that our students are well-prepared for the challenges of the 21st century.

I encourage all our students to make the most of the opportunities available to them, to be curious learners, and to embrace the values of integrity, respect, and excellence. Together, let us continue to build on our legacy of success and make A.E.R.E School and College a place where dreams are nurtured and futures are built.

With warm regards,

principal.name: Sudhangshu Shekhor Roy
principal.excerpt: The magnificently, systematically and admirably designed Dhaka Residential Model College has been serving the nation for decades with quality education and moral values.
principal.message:
Dear Students and Parents,

 As the Principal of A.E.R.E School and College, I am delighted to address our vibrant school community. Our institution has consistently maintained its reputation for academic excellence and comprehensive student development, and I am committed to upholding and enhancing this legacy.

Education is not merely about acquiring knowledge; it is about developing the ability to think critically, communicate effectively, and act responsibly. At A.E.R.E, we focus on creating a learning environment that encourages intellectual curiosity, creativity, and innovation. Our curriculum is designed to challenge students while providing them with the support they need to succeed.

We are particularly proud of our science-focused approach to education, which reflects our affiliation with the Atomic Energy Research Establishment. Our students have access to exceptional laboratory facilities and experienced teachers who inspire them to explore the wonders of science and technology. Many of our alumni have gone on to pursue successful careers in STEM fields, making significant contributions to society.

Beyond academics, we emphasize the importance of extracurricular activities and character building. Through sports, cultural programs, debates, and community service, we help students develop leadership skills, teamwork, and a sense of social responsibility. We believe that a well-rounded education prepares students not just for exams, but for life.

I encourage our students to set high goals, work hard with determination, and never stop learning. To the parents, I extend my gratitude for your trust and partnership in your children's educational journey. Together, we can create an environment where every student can thrive and achieve their dreams.

Best wishes,
Sudhangshu Shekhor Roy
Principal
